description:
Since 1983, DeNoia Tambasco & Germann Attorneys At Law has been supporting clients through civil and family law matters. Our law firm is based in Toms River, New Jersey. We have more than a century of combined experience navigating issues such as the following:

  • Family law: Divorce, child custody, property division and mediation
  • Personal injury: Car wrecks, construction accidents, dog bites and medical malpractice
  • Real estate: Land ownership, easements, licenses and breached contracts
  • Estate planning: Wills, trusts and probate
  • Municipal and corporate law

The attorneys at our law firm excel in litigation and negotiation settings. We have returned multiple verdicts totaling more than $1 million for our clients. As aggressive as we are when fighting for our clients' rights, we remain compassionate when assessing how we can help them. At every turn, we are in constant communication and respond quickly to their concerns.

Part of the reason we have an exceptional reputation with our clients is due to our efficiency. We strive to bring cases to a close in a way that preserves time and money. After all, the sooner our clients can move forward with their lives, the better. Our law firm works with businesses and individuals to develop personalized solutions. DeNoia Tambasco & Germann Attorneys At Law offers virtual appointments.
